solution_line_template: Heath planted {rows} rows x {plants_per_row} plants = <<{rows}*{plants_per_row}={total_plants}>>{total_plants} carrot plants.
He planted {total_plants} plants in {hours_spent} hours, or {total_plants} / {hours_spent} = <<{total_plants}/{hours_spent}={plants_per_hour}>>{plants_per_hour} plants per hour.
